nodes.text: Wing 3 was the callsign of one of the Republic warships that participated in the Second Battle of Onderon in 3998 BBY.
Wing 3 was a gray-hulled cylinder-shaped battlecruiser with a prominent command tower, and gun batteries lining the sides of its bow area.

The ship was the first to register the arrival of a civilian ship, the Tetan Royal Space Yacht, Krath Enchanter. Wing 3 was ordered by Nomi Sunrider to make them leave the security military zone. In response, Satal Keto turned his vessel towards the planet and ran past the blockade.
